Title: AirPods Production in India Reportedly Begins Next Month
Description:
Apple's manufacturing partner Foxconn plans to begin assembling AirPods at its factory in Hyderabad, India in April, the Press Trust of India said today.
The report cited an industry source.
The report did not indicate which AirPods models will be manufa…

Title: Foldable iPhone and iPad to Enter Production Next Year, Analyst Says
Description:
Apple's first two foldable devices recently entered the New Product Introduction (NPI) phase at Foxconn, according to analyst Jeff Pu.
In a research note today with GF Securities, Pu said mass production of the foldable devices is slated to begin in the …

Title: Deadly storms hit multiple southern states. And, hundreds of Venezuelans deported
Description:
Residents are assessing damage from severe weather that hit multiple U.S.
states over the weekend.
And, hundreds of people accused of being in a Venezuelan gang have been deported.

Title: Wholesale egg prices are going down. How soon will it affect your grocery bill?
Description: Economists say the sharp decline in wholesale egg prices is a positive sign, with some anticipating lower prices at grocery stores in a few weeks.

Title: Her cancer diagnosis made motherhood both harder and more sweet
Description: As cancer rates rise among people under 50, more and more parents are facing the heightened emotions and challenging logistics of raising kids while going through treatment.

Title: How Alabama students went from last place to rising stars in math
Description:
Alabama is the only state where 4th-grade math scores are higher now than they were in 2019, before the pandemic.
This is the story of how the state pulled it off.

Title: FSF's Memorabilia Silent Auction Begins Today
Description:

"Starting March 17, the FSF will unlock items each day for bidding on the LibrePlanet wiki at 12:00 EDT..

Description:

This is not what I wanted, to let everybody lose their job."

Title: I work at a leading quantum lab: Here are the qualifications recruiters in the field are looking for
Description:
Yaad Oren is a managing director at one of the world's largest tech companies.
He explained what recruiters in quantum computing are looking for.

Title: The Truth Behind Thailand’s Full Moon Party in The White Lotus
Description: The party that provides the backdrop for Season 3 Episode 5 has evolved significantly over decades, and its future is uncertain.

Title: Let the Girls Play
Description:
Women have always loved America’s pastime.
It has never loved them back.

Title: Secret court hearing on iCloud encryption underway amid demands to make it public
Description:
A secret court hearing on iCloud encryption began on Friday, amid calls in both the UK and US to make the proceedings public.
The British government is demanding that Apple create backdoor access, not just for the personal data of British citizens, but for…
